channel.title: Just a simple sig for those of you who use the GIMP
channel.description:
this is just a simple sig i whipped together this morning... for those of you who edit with the GIMP and would like to promote it :). yes i used a pixelated font... pixels are cool :) [img]http://img185.imageshack.us/img185/9793/allimageseditedusingtheep2.jpg[/img]
you can rate if youd like i dont care.
Im starting to think no one uses the GIMP?
